author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In council gathered, minds of wisdom sought,
On boards of governance did leaders convene,
To pierce the veil, of matters grave and taut,
In hallowed halls, the future to glean.

A lofty quest, of might and intellect,
Elon, famed star-crossed smith, in venture bold,
His craft of AI to beget,
And grasp the secrets of cosmos untold.

In stern decree, the Governor speaks,
From Oklahoma's raging tempest lands,
Calls for resignations, scandal creaks,
And threatening voices, to quell their demands.

feedItems.title: What The Board Needs To Know
feedItems.content: Everything from the week beginning April 17th, 2023 that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week, we ask whether board directors are prepared for the prospect of data leaks, plus updates on what directors need to know about the SEC’s expected cyber rules timeline, the potential for further cyber insurance rate rises and more stringent policy requirements, and a new study on the role of the chief executive in managing cyber risks.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Everything from the week beginning April 17th, 2023 that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week, we ask whether board directors are prepared for the prospect of data leaks, plus updates on what directors need to know about the SEC’s expected cyber rules timeline, the potential for further cyber insurance rate rises and more stringent policy requirements, and a new study on the role of the chief executive in managing cyber risks.

feedItems.title: Elon Musk Says His AI Project Will Seek to Understand the Nature of the Universe
feedItems.content: Musk spoke about his AI ambitions in an interview with Fox News Channel’s “Tucker Carlson Tonight,” excerpts show.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Musk spoke about his AI ambitions in an interview with Fox News Channel’s “Tucker Carlson Tonight,” excerpts show.

feedItems.title: Oklahoma Governor Calls for Resignations After Threatening Audio Surfaces
feedItems.content: McCurtain County officials allegedly discussed killing journalists and lynchings.
feedItems.contentSnippet: McCurtain County officials allegedly discussed killing journalists and lynchings.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In Nielsen's goblet, God hath poured, (1)
Accreditation now restored; (2)
Ænglish wine of media's grace, (3)
Their reputation to embrace. (4)

Fox News and Dominion, they (1)
Usurp the tongue of saints, astray; (2)
In defamation's trial's brew, (3)
Both face the risks, God's judgment true. (4)

Good Gershkovich, scribe so fair, (1)
At last, a visit doth declare; (2)
U.S. saints their presence bring, (3)
To aid his plight, God's mercy sing. (4)

feedItems.title: Nielsen Regains Key Media Accreditation
feedItems.content: The TV ratings giant’s seal of approval had been suspended by the Media Rating Council since 2021.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The TV ratings giant’s seal of approval had been suspended by the Media Rating Council since 2021.

feedItems.title: Fox News, Dominion Each Face Risks If Defamation Case Goes to Trial
feedItems.content: The network’s push to settle its case with Dominion Voting Systems leaves both sides weighing strengths and weaknesses of their positions
feedItems.contentSnippet: The network’s push to settle its case with Dominion Voting Systems leaves both sides weighing strengths and weaknesses of their positions

feedItems.title: WSJ Reporter Evan Gershkovich Allowed First Visit From U.S. Official Since Detention
feedItems.content: U.S. Ambassador to Russia Lynne Tracy visited Mr. Gershkovich in Moscow’s Lefortovo prison and said he is “in good health and remains strong.”
feedItems.contentSnippet: U.S. Ambassador to Russia Lynne Tracy visited Mr. Gershkovich in Moscow’s Lefortovo prison and said he is “in good health and remains strong.”

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
As goats in meadows graze, our eyes beguiled,
Love's blindness now unveiled, new bard hath styled,
With subtle pause, a reunion's fate begot,
On yon streaming bank, delayed joys we sought.

In markets flourished, timid hounds embark,
Beneath the ambient glow, stocks seek their mark,
E'er the sandpipers' rise, returns amassed,
To weigh the heavy coffer, rates surpassed.

Hark, the snarl of dog and hare apace,
House panel's clamor spreads in hallowed place,
In New York's tempest cloud, discordant din,
Raging partisan throngs, words clash within.

feedItems.title: Netflix Releases 'Love Is Blind' Reunion Show After Delay
feedItems.content: The planned live event on Sunday was disrupted by an issue with streaming.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The planned live event on Sunday was disrupted by an issue with streaming.

feedItems.title: Stocks Edge Up as Investors Weigh Higher Rates
feedItems.content: Stocks and bond yields rose ahead of a busy week of earnings, with some of the biggest U.S. corporations due to report results.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Stocks and bond yields rose ahead of a busy week of earnings, with some of the biggest U.S. corporations due to report results.

feedItems.title: Partisan Bickering, Outbursts Interrupt House Panel's Hearing in New York
feedItems.content: The Republican-led House Judiciary Committee convened a contentious hearing in New York about crime in the city and the policies of Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The Republican-led House Judiciary Committee convened a contentious hearing in New York about crime in the city and the policies of Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
A-hark, ye traders by the shore,
Where rate hikes fuel hearts implore,
The bondholders of Pacific's mirth,
Canadian choirs entwined forthwith.

Exclaim the news anon we see,
Of U.S. hands in chains set free,
Charging dozens, fates entwine,
With China's schemes, o'er land malign.

On Connecticut's green bestowed,
Where equine sentinels make their abode,
Yon farm doth sell in close embrace,
A decade's dance upon the stage.

feedItems.title: Pro Take: Rate Hikes Fuel Bondholders' Canadian Pacific Trade
feedItems.content: Some of the railroad company’s bonds lost value when interest rates rose, tempting distressed-debt investors to seek profit through a full payout.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Some of the railroad company’s bonds lost value when interest rates rose, tempting distressed-debt investors to seek profit through a full payout.

feedItems.title: U.S. Arrests Two, Charges Dozens for Alleged Illegal Activities by China
feedItems.content: Prosecutors say China set up a police station in New York and ran a social-media scheme to harass critics of Beijing.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Prosecutors say China set up a police station in New York and ran a social-media scheme to harass critics of Beijing.

feedItems.title: Connecticut Horse Farm Sells After Nearly a Decade On and Off the Market
feedItems.content: The 87-acre property, which closed for $24 million, first listed for $55 million in 2014.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The 87-acre property, which closed for $24 million, first listed for $55 million in 2014.
